http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/store/product/mavea-elemaris-xl-water-filtration-pitcher/133302?Keyword=mavea
MAVEA Elemaris XL Water Filtration Pitchers hold up to 9 cups of water and allow automatic pour-through-lid refilling for easy refill. Suitable for use on your kitchen counter and designed for your dining room table. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.
